actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-113.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 39) to provide for the designation and conservation of certain public lands in the State of Alaska, including the designation of units of the National Park, National Wildlife Refuge, National Forest, National Wild and Scenic Rivers, and National Wilderness Preservation Systems, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 39 (Alaska lands conservation).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 39) to provide for the designation and conservation of certain public lands in the State of Alaska, including the designation of units of the National Park, National Wildlife Refuge, National Forest, National Wild and Scenic Rivers, and National Wilderness Preservation Systems, and for other purposes.
